languages.text:
Немногие могут похвастаться тем, что пережили встречу с ксеносом, еще меньше — что знакомы с одним из подобных существ. Однако привилегии Вольного Торговца позволяют заводить друзей даже среди Детей Азуриана — именно так зовет себя народ Ирлиэт Ланевисс, загадочной и немногословной эльдарки.
Путь Изгоя привел Ирлиэт на агромир Янус, где она и встретилась с Вольным Торговцем. Присоединившись к {mf|его|ее} команде, Ирлиэт рассчитывает отправиться к дальним звездам и раскрыть тайну, окутывающую гибель ее родного мира-корабля. Ради этого эльдарка готова на все — включая самые отчаянные шаги.

traits.locale_text:
Немногие могут гордиться тем, что пережили встречу с ксеносом, еще меньше — знакомством с одним из подобных существ. Однако привилегии Вольного Торговца позволяют заводить друзей даже среди детей Асурьян — именно так зовет себя народ Ирлиэт Ланевисс, загадочной и немногословной эльдарки.
Путь Изгоя привел Ирлиэт на агромир Янус, где она и встретилась с Вольным Торговцем. Присоединившись к {mf|его|ее} команде, Ирлиэт рассчитывает отправиться к дальним звездам и раскрыть тайну, окутывающую гибель ее родного мира-корабля. Ради этого эльдарка готова на многое — возможно, слишком многое, чтобы ей можно было доверять.

languages.text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.
languages.original_text:
Немногие могут похвастаться тем, что пережили встречу с ксеносом, еще меньше — что знакомы с одним из подобных существ. Однако привилегии Вольного Торговца позволяют заводить друзей даже среди Детей Азуриана — именно так зовет себя народ Ирлиэт Ланевисс, загадочной и немногословной эльдарки.
Путь Изгоя привел Ирлиэт на агромир Янус, где она и встретилась с Вольным Торговцем. Присоединившись к {mf|его|ее} команде, Ирлиэт рассчитывает отправиться к дальним звездам и раскрыть тайну, окутывающую гибель ее родного мира-корабля. Ради этого эльдарка готова на все — включая самые отчаянные шаги.

traits.locale_text:
Few can take pride in surviving an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer — in striking a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of the Rogue Trader allow you to make acquaintances even among the children of Asuryan — that is what the brethren of Yrliet Lanevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agriworld of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. Joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her Craftworld. For the sake of this, the Aeldari would do anything — perhaps even too much to be trusted.

Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

Few can take pride in surviving an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer in striking up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will do anything to accomplish her mission — perhaps too much to be trusted.

Few can take pride in surviving an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer in striking up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will do anything to accomplish her mission — perhaps too much to be trusted.

Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

languages.text:
很少有人能在遭遇异形之后存活下来。至于能与异形建立友谊的人，更是凤毛麟角。然而，行商浪人拥有着无与伦比的特权，甚至可以与阿苏焉的子嗣相互结识，神秘而沉默的艾达灵族伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝便是其中之一。
伊莉耶特踏上了流浪者道途，辗转来到了农业世界加努斯，在那里遇到了行商浪人。她成为了行商浪人的船员，希望能前往遥远的星空，了解她的方舟世界究竟是如何覆灭的。这位艾达灵族将会不惜一切代价完成她的任务，哪怕是最要采取最为孤注一掷的举动，她都绝不会犹豫半分。
languages.original_text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

traits.locale_text:
很少有人能在遭遇异形之后存活下来。至于能与异形建立友谊的人，就更是凤毛麟角了。然而，行商浪人拥有着无与伦比的特权，甚至可以与阿苏焉的子嗣相互结识，神秘而沉默的艾达灵族伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝便是其中之一。
伊莉耶特踏上了流浪者道途，辗转来到了农业世界加努斯，在那里遇到了行商浪人。她成为了行商浪人的船员，希望能前往遥远的星空，了解她的方舟世界究竟是如何覆灭的。这位艾达灵族将会不惜一切代价完成她的任务，她对这个目标有着令人难以置信的深重执念。

languages.text:
Pocos pueden afirmar haber sobrevivido a un encuentro con un xenos, y menos aún de haberse ganado la amistad de uno de estos seres. Sin embargo, los privilegios de ser Comerciante Independiente le permiten a un{mf|o|a} entablar relaciones cordiales incluso con los hijos de Asuryan, que es como el pueblo de Yrliet Lanaevyss, una misteriosa y taciturna Aeldari, se hace llamar.
La senda de la proscrita llevó a Yrliet al mundo agrícola de Janus, donde conoció a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Al unirse a su tripulación, Yrliet busca viajar a las estrellas lejanas para desvelar el misterio que rodea la muerte de su mundo astronave. La Aeldari hará lo que sea para cumplir su misión... recurriendo a las medidas más desesperadas.
languages.original_text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

traits.locale_text:
Pocos pueden enorgullecerse de sobrevivir a un encuentro con un xenos, y menos aún de ganarse la amistad de uno de estos seres. Sin embargo, los privilegios de ser Comerciante Independiente le permiten a un{mf|o|a} entablar relaciones cordiales incluso con los hijos de Asuryan, que es como el pueblo de Yrliet Lanaevyss, una misteriosa y taciturna Aeldari, se hace llamar.
La senda de la proscrita llevó a Yrliet al mundo agrícola de Janus, donde conoció a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Al unirse a su tripulación, Yrliet busca viajar a las estrellas lejanas para desvelar el misterio que rodea la muerte de su mundo astronave. La Aeldari hará lo que sea para cumplir su misión... así que tal vez no sea prudente fiarse de ella.

languages.text:
異種族と遭遇して生き延びたと主張する者は少なく、友好関係を築ける者はさらに稀だ。しかし、自由開拓者の特権を持つ者であれば、アシュリアンの御子ら（寡黙にして神秘的なアエルダリのユリエット・ラナエフィスが、自身と同族をこう呼ぶ）との縁さえ得ることができる。
追放者という道を歩むユリエットはヤヌスの農業惑星へと導かれ、そこで自由開拓者と出会う。{mf|彼|彼女}のクルーに加わることで、ユリエットは遠くの星々を巡り、彼女の方舟の終焉にまつわる謎を解き明かしたいと願っていた。このアエルダリは、使命を果たすためなら、いかなる犠牲も、いかなる命懸けな手段も厭わない。
languages.original_text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

traits.locale_text:
異種族と遭遇して生き延びたと主張する者は少なく、友好関係を築ける者はさらに稀だ。しかし、自由開拓者の特権を持つ者であれば、アシュリアンの御子ら（寡黙にして神秘的なアエルダリのユリエット・ラナエフィスが、自身と同族をこう呼ぶ）との縁さえ得ることができる。
追放者という道を歩むユリエットはヤヌスの農業惑星へと導かれ、そこで自由開拓者と出会う。{mf|彼|彼女}のクルーに加わることで、ユリエットは遠くの星々を巡り、彼女の方舟の終焉にまつわる謎を解き明かしたいと願っていた。このアエルダリは、使命を果たすためなら、いかなる犠牲も、いかなる命懸けな手段も厭わない。

languages.text:
Nur wenige können von sich behaupten, eine Begegnung mit einem Xenos überlebt zu haben, und noch weniger haben sich mit einem dieser Geschöpfe angefreundet. Als Freihändler hat man jedoch das Privileg, selbst mit den Kindern von Asuryan Bekanntschaft zu schließen, wie sich die Verwandten von Yrliet Lanaevyss nennen, einer mysteriösen und schweigsamen Aeldari.
Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen hat Yrliet auf die Agrarwelt Janus geführt, wo sie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} begegnet ist. Yrliet hat sich {mf|dessen|deren} Crew angeschlossen, um zu fernen Sternen zu reisen und das Geheimnis zu ergründen, warum ihr Weltenschiff untergegangen ist. Diese Aeldari wird alles Erdenkliche tun, um ihre Mission zu beenden und greift dabei auch zu verzweifelten Maßnahmen.
languages.original_text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

traits.locale_text:

Als Freihändler hat man jedoch das Privileg, selbst mit den Kindern von Asuryan Bekanntschaft zu schließen, wie sich die Verwandten von Yrliet Lanaevyss nennen, einer mysteriösen und schweigsamen Aeldari.
Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen hat Yrliet auf die Agrarwelt Janus geführt, wo sie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} begegnet ist. Yrliet hat sich {mf|dessen|deren} Crew angeschlossen, um zu fernen Sternen zu reisen und das Geheimnis zu ergründen, warum ihr Weltenschiff untergegangen ist. Diese Aeldari wird alles Erdenkliche tun, um ihre Mission zu beenden und greift dabei auch zu verzweifelten Maßnahmen.

languages.text:
Rares sont ceux qui peuvent se targuer d'avoir survécu à une rencontre avec un xénos, et plus encore ceux qui réussissent à se lier d'amitié avec l'une de ces créatures. Cependant, les privilèges associés au statut de libre-marchand permettent de nouer des contacts jusque dans les rangs des enfants d'Asuryan, comme se font appeler les congénères d'Yrliet Lanaevyss, une Aeldari aussi taciturne que mystérieuse.
C'est en suivant la Voie de l'Errance qu'Yrliet a atterri sur l'agri-monde de Janus, où elle a rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. En rejoignant son équipage, elle espère explorer les étoiles les plus reculées et élucider le mystère entourant la disparition de son vaisseau-monde. Cette Aeldari ne reculera devant rien, pas même les mesures les plus désespérées, pour arriver à ses fins.
languages.original_text:
Few can claim to have survived an encounter with a xenos, and even fewer to have struck up a friendship with one of these creatures. However, the privileges of a Rogue Trader allow one to make acquaintances even among the Children of Asuryan — that is what the kin of Yrliet Lanaevyss, a mysterious and taciturn Aeldari, call themselves.
The Path of the Outcast led Yrliet to the agri-world of Janus, where she met the Rogue Trader. In joining {mf|his|her} crew, Yrliet hopes to travel to the distant stars and uncover the mystery surrounding the demise of her craftworld. This Aeldari will go to any lengths to accomplish her mission, taking even the most desperate measures.

traits.locale_text:
Rares sont ceux qui peuvent se targuer d'avoir survécu à une rencontre avec un xénos, et plus encore ceux qui réussissent à se lier d'amitié avec l'une de ces créatures. Cependant, les privilèges associés au statut de libre-marchand permettent de nouer des contacts jusque dans les rangs des enfants d'Asuryan, comme se font appeler les congénères d'Yrliet Lanaevyss, une Aeldari aussi taciturne que mystérieuse.
C'est en suivant la Voie de l'Errance qu'Yrliet a atterri sur l'agri-monde de Janus, où elle a rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. En rejoignant son équipage, elle espère explorer les étoiles les plus reculées et élucider le mystère entourant la disparition de son vaisseau-monde. Cette Aeldari est prête à tout pour arriver à ses fins, à tel point qu'il pourrait s'avérer risqué de lui faire confiance.

languages.text:
Bir zeno ile karşılaşıp da sağ kalabilen sayısı azdır, hele ki bu yaratıklardan biriyle dostluk kurabilenler daha da azdır. Ancak Hür Tacir, makamının getirdiği ayrıcalıklar sayesinde Asuryan'ın Çocukları (Yrliet Lanaevyss'in gizemli ve ketum Aeldari soydaşları kendilerinden böyle bahsetmektedirler) arasında bile tanıdık edinebilmiştir.
Yurtsuzun Yolu, Yrliet'in ziraat dünyası Janus'un yolunu tutarak burada Hür Tacir ile tanışmasına vesile olmuştur. Yrliet, Hür Tacir'in mürettebatına katılarak uzak yıldızlara seyahat edebilmeyi ve zanaat dünyasının yıkımının ardındaki sır perdesini aralamayı ummaktadır. Bu Aeldari, görevini tamamlayabilmek uğruna gözünü karartmaktan, en ümitsiz yollara sapmaktan dahi çekinmeyecektir.
